original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū thūpakato omadditvā piṇḍapātaṁ bhuñjanti …pe….
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyāḥ bhikkhū thūpakataḥ omadditvā piṇḍapātam bhuñjanti pe

original: “Na thūpakato omadditvā piṇḍapātaṁ bhuñjissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā”ti.
analyzed: na thūpakataḥ omadditvā piṇḍapātam bhuñjissāmi iti sikkhā karaṇīyā ati

original: Yo anādariyaṁ paṭicca thūpakato omadditvā piṇḍapātaṁ bhuñjati āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: yaḥ anādariyam paṭicca thūpakataḥ omadditvā piṇḍapātam bhuñjati āpatti dukkaṭassa

original: parittake sese ekato saṅkaḍḍhitvā omadditvā bhuñjati,
analyzed: parittake sese ekatas saṅkaḍḍhitvā omadditvā bhuñjati
